content:
We did ALL of this yesterday, on test and it worked.....

Our domain.xml files are different on test and production.... Way different, is this a problem - missing something?????

Now we can't restart payara6 (after doing the unzip... upgrade).

upgrading to V6.3 - getting error:

Job for payara.service failed because the control process exited with error code.
See "systemctl status payara.service" and "journalctl -xeu payara.service" for details.
Yikes. I'm not sure what that is. @Don Sizemore are you around? Have you seen this?
@Sherry Lake , are you willing to e-mail me your Payara server.log?
Tim is getting that now. @Don Sizemore
@Don Sizemore best email for you?

Thanks @Don Sizemore

Solution......
Just to be certain, you've clearedÂ generated,Â osgi-cacheÂ andÂ lib/databases

Ok... that fixed it.

We had deleted them according to the release notes....
Then undeploy did not work, so we stopped / started payara to get the undeploy to work.

And those directories were recreated.?
Correct, Dataverse will re-create each of these.
Sherry Lake has marked this topic as resolved.
